  14. (**************************************************************************)

  16. (* Liveness analysis.
  17.    Annotate mach code with the set of regs live at each point. *)

  19. open Mach

  21. module Domain = struct
  22.   type t = Reg.Set.t
  23.   let bot = Reg.Set.empty
  24.   let join = Reg.Set.union
  25.   let lessequal = Reg.Set.subset
  26. end

  28. module Analyzer = Dataflow.Backward(Domain)

  30. let transfer i ~next ~exn =
  31.   match i.desc with
  32.   | Ireturn | Iop(Itailcall_ind) | Iop(Itailcall_imm _) ->
  33.       i.live <- Reg.Set.empty; (* no regs are live across *)
  34.       Reg.set_of_array i.arg
  35.   | Iop op ->
  36.       if operation_is_pure op                 (* no side effects *)
  37.       && Reg.disjoint_set_array next i.res    (* results are not used after *)
  38.       then begin
  39.         (* This operation is dead code.  Ignore its arguments. *)
  40.         i.live <- next;
  41.         next
  42.       end else begin
  43. ‌        let across1 = Reg.diff_set_array next i.res in
  44. ‌        let across =
  45.           (* Operations that can raise an exception (function calls,
  46.              bounds checks, allocations) can branch to the
  47.              nearest enclosing try ... with.
  48.              Hence, everything that must be live at the beginning of
  49.              the exception handler must also be live across this instr. *)
  50.           if operation_can_raise op
  51.           then Reg.Set.union across1 exn
  52.           else across1 in
  53.         i.live <- across;
  54.         Reg.add_set_array across i.arg
  55.       end
  56.   | Iifthenelse _
  57.   | Iswitch _ ->
  58.       i.live <- next;
  59.       Reg.add_set_array next i.arg
  60.   | Iend | Icatch _ | Iexit _ | Itrywith _ ->
  61.       i.live <- next;
  62.       next
  63.   | Iraise _ ->
  64.       i.live <- exn;
  65.       Reg.add_set_array exn i.arg

  67. ‌let exnhandler before_handler =
  68.   Reg.Set.remove Proc.loc_exn_bucket before_handler

  70. ‌let fundecl f =
  71.   let (initially_live, _) =
  72.     Analyzer.analyze ~exnhandler ~transfer f.fun_body in
  73.   (* Sanity check: only function parameters can be live at entrypoint *)
  74.   let wrong_live = Reg.Set.diff initially_live (Reg.set_of_array f.fun_args) in
  75.   if not (Reg.Set.is_empty wrong_live) then begin
  76.     Misc.fatal_errorf "@[Liveness.fundecl:@\n%a@]"
  77.       Printmach.regset wrong_live
  78.   end
